text.title: Australian Eddie Jones named as England's rugby union head coach
text.head: Australian Eddie Jones named as England's rugby union head coach
Sources

list.item: "Eddie Jones: Australian appointed England head coach" — BBC Sport , November 20, 2015
"Eddie Jones appointed England head coach by RFU" — The Guardian , November 20, 2015
Mitch Phillips. "Australian Jones named England's first foreign coach" — Reuters , November 20, 2015
Jack de Menezes. "Stuart Lancaster resigns: England head coach quits after Rugby World Cup failure" — The Independent , November 11, 2015
